Create an "Out the Window" meme-style four-panel comic titled "How to Improve Development Efficiency with AI? å¦‚ä½•å€ŸåŠ© AI æå‡å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼Ÿ", featuring dialogues in speech bubbles.Â 

--ar 9:16

Characters:

- Boss: Asian male wearing a suit, with neatly parted hair.
- Employee Xiaoming: Male, wearing a blue checkered shirt.
- Employee Xiaohong: Female.
- Employee Xiaohu: Female, Asian, straight bangs hairstyle, wearing red-framed glasses.

Panel Descriptions:

- Top panel (single wide panel):
Â  The boss asks during a meeting: "How can we use AI to improve development efficiency? æˆ‘ä»¬è¦å¦‚ä½•å€ŸåŠ© AI æå‡å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼Ÿ"

Â  Three employees sit listening.

- Second panel (single wide panel):
Â  Each employee responds individually:

Â  - Xiaoming: "We use AI to write unit tests. æˆ‘ä»¬ç”¨ AI å†™å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•"
Â  - Xiaohong: "We use AI for code reviews. æˆ‘ä»¬ç”¨ AI åšä»£ç å®¡æŸ¥"
Â  - Xiaohu: â€œVibe Codingã€‚â€

- Third row (two panels):
Â  - Left panel: The boss looks furious.
Â  - Right panel: Employee Xiaohu is humorously kicked out of a high-rise window.

quoted.text:
ğŸŒ nano banana promt

This prompt creates a Pixar-style 3D animated scene showing a cheerful, personality-driven group selfie moment, featuring characters with expressive poses and culturally-inspired clothing. Users customize the characters, background, and details to vividly represent their unique personalities and cultural contexts.

(Please change the names )
â€”-

A vibrant Pixar-style 3D animated scene depicting a joyful group selfie moment featuring <group of characters> in a <culturally representative environment>.
At the center, <main character> confidently holds a selfie stick topped with an iPhone, wearing an expression that clearly reflects their <distinctive personality trait> and exudes <leadership or core presence>.
To the left, <character A> adopts a pose or action reflective of their <distinct personality trait>, showcasing an expressive face that vividly captures their <personality description>.
On the right side, <character B> strikes a playful/humorous/cute pose, holding a characteristic item (<character Bâ€™s representative object>), with an exaggerated, lively facial expression highlighting their <distinctive personality trait>.
Additional characters (optional):

Nearby, <character C> performs an action or posture aligned with their personality, bearing an expressive facial expression that encapsulates their unique personality traits.
All characters wear bright, cheerful, and adorably rounded outfits styled in a contemporary fusion of traditional and modern attire representative of their cultural or historical backgrounds.
The scene is warmly lit, colorful, and filled with dynamic expressions and lively poses.
The background features a setting emblematic of the characters' cultural identities or personalitiesâ€”such as cherry blossoms, lakes, mountains, historic architecture, or fantasy-like natural landscapesâ€”rendered in the adorable, cinematic style characteristic of Pixar animations.
The overall composition exudes energy, humor, and heartwarming joy, capturing the essence of each character through their selfie expressions and postures.

â€”-

Names: [Frodo, Sam, Aragorn, Gandalf, Legolas, Gimli]
